definition: a coding system used for transmitting messages requiring brevity or secrecy, to convert ordinary language into code
details:
noun
- a coding system used for transmitting messages requiring brevity or secrecy
- (computer science) the symbolic arrangement of data or instructions in a computer program or the set of such instructions
= synonyms: computer code
- a set of rules or principles or laws (especially written ones)
= synonyms: codification
verb
- to convert ordinary language into code
= example: to convert ordinary language into code
= synonyms: cipher, cypher
- to attach a code to
